qas.question: Who reduced the validity of covid-19 tests?
For whom was the validity of covid-19 tests reduced for?
For how long was the validity reduced for ?

answers.text: Authorities reduce validity of COVID-19 tests for arriving travelers

paragraphs.context: Authorities reduce validity of COVID-19 tests for arriving travelers from 48 to 24 hours

answers.text: All vaccines authorised by the European Medicines Agency (EMA) and the World Health Organization (WHO)

qas.question: Who do vaccines need to be authorised by?

answers.text: European Medicines Agency (EMA) and the World Health Organization (WHO)

qas.question: How many of the vaccinces authorised by the who and ema will be accepted?

paragraphs.context: All vaccines authorised by the European Medicines Agency (EMA) and the World Health Organization (WHO) will be accepted.
